item.title: ScrabbleBot
item.description: A project about using functional programming to implement a Scrabble Bot.

item.description: A website for generating random memes based on components from user submitted memes.

item.description: A webassembly implementation of a gambling game found in WoW.

item.description: A project where two adverserial groups were taught to hide and seek through reinforcement and evolutionary learning.

item.description: An api for generating random memes based on components from user submitted memes.

item.title: Buoyancy-Regulating Robot
item.description: A robot used to locate liquid-liquid interfaces by regulating the robots volume and embedded electromechanical actuation.
